subject: Hello
body:
Hello 
Your message is noted with thanks, I genuinely want to appreciate your response and to say God bless you.
However I am in the UK not in the USA.
My account was used to collect loans and any money that enters into it will be collected that is why I cannot risk this money you are sending.
Am genuinely appealing and suggesting that you send the 500$ through CASH APP OR  ZELLE OR PAYPAL ACCOUNT. USA TO USA. 
I look forward to hearing from you
God bless you and may no one cast evil eyes on you Amen
Nurse Palmer
palmernurse@aol.com

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Nurse Palmer,

Thank you for your response. I understand your concern about the money being collected if it enters your account. I appreciate your suggestion of using Cash App, Zelle, or PayPal for the transaction. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information about why my assistance is needed and how this transaction would work? I want to make sure I fully understand the situation.

Thank you again for reaching out and God bless you too.

Best wishes,
Walter
